welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Summerfield, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly locals, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Delta, United, and other major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, and other airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 45 minutes per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling on private aircraft, the private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport provides a more exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is used exclusively by military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's wifi network for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lee Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
